aka: 绝密录音档案：德军自白

cast.name: 尼古拉斯·法瑞尔 Nicholas Farrell

writer.name: 克里斯托弗·斯宾塞 Christopher Spencer

director.name: 克里斯托弗·斯宾塞 Christopher Spencer

this_title: Spying on Hitlers Army The Secret Recordings
trans_title: 绝密录音档案：德军自白
introduction: This powerful docu-drama tells the story of one of World War Two's last secrets - an audacious British intelligence operation to listen in on the private conversations of 10,000 German POWs without their ever knowing they were being overheard. Now dramatized - word for word from the original transcripts - the film tells how this vast operation captured not only vital military intelligence but kept secret shocking accounts of war crimes - letting the guilty walk free. (Written by Christopher Spencer)
foreign_title: Spying on Hitlers Army The Secret Recordings
